content: embrace elegance with the golden halo mobius crochet cowl pattern this intermediate-level project features a reversible design with front and back post stitches worked seamlessly in the round the pattern includes written instructions and a helpful video tutorial to guide you through the process this cowl offers a cozy and stylish addition to your wardrobe with a variety of styling options **unique features-** reversible design for versatile styling front and back post stitches add texture seamless construction for a polished finish written pattern and video tutorial for easy understanding **materials needed-** hook us-n 10 mm hook **susan bates** https //amzn to/3zynanq yarn **caron colorama halo** https //amzn to/3hgn0xj bulky weight 470-475 yards
